snippet: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney had simple instructions for 340-pound defensive lineman Dexter Lawrence when he first used him on offense: "Go that way."...
lead_paragraph: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney had simple instructions for 340-pound defensive lineman Dexter Lawrence when he first used him on offense: "Go that way."

headline.main: Big Guys, Big Plays: Alabama, Clemson Go Jumbo on Offense
headline.print_headline: Big Guys, Big Plays: Alabama, Clemson Go Jumbo on Offense
